content: I'm sorry to hear about that experience. it's a common problem that many communities face when hosting major events, and efforts must be made to prevent such disruptions. it's critical to ensure that the development of sports facilities and related infrastructure is done in an inclusive and participatory manner, with the participation and engagement of all stakeholders, including the communities that will be impacted by these developments. hosting major events should bring positive impacts to the local communities, and it's essential to take steps to minimize negative impacts and maximize benefits.
